page.title: 08RELIGION IN DECLINE
page.content: This area is generally associated with the{Non Conformist Church Movement}and there are numerous examples of chapels such as{Methodist,Independent}and {Baptist,}to be found.There are also examples of other faiths to be found in the area such as{Church in Wales, {Catholic Church}and{Jehovah's Witness. However apart from the latter two faiths,there appears to be a general decline in the number of people attending church or chapel services. A few chapel buildings have been abandoned altogether and are now for sale.These tend to be in a state of decay and are subjected to a great deal of vandalism. It would seem that the once strong influence of the chapel within the community has disappeared and is now only prevalent with the older generation.
